item.title: Augmented Reality
item.description: Description A project named “AR for Kid”. Although there are many libraries for this problem, we do it from scratch to learn how it works.

item.title: Crowd Counting
item.description: Description This is the graduation thesis. We spent 4 months researching this problem and a semester before preparing research skills.

item.title: Face Recognition
item.description: Description The client’s face recognition system with a direct viewing angle. Input: A video from camera.

item.title: Image Retrieval System
item.description: Description This is the project for “Multimedia Information Retrival” course. We will rank top N relevant images from database to the query image.

item.title: Ragnarok Online
item.description: Description Ragnarok Online (RO) is MMORPG created by Gravity based on the manhwa Ragnarok by Lee Myung-jin.

item.title: Robocode Bot
item.description: Description Robocode is a programming game, where the goal is to develop a robot battle tank to battle against other tanks in Java or .
